metadata.title: Logitech Pebble i345 Bluetooth Optical Mouse for iPad - No Wireless Receiver - Graphite (Renewed)
features: Meet the Logitech Pebble i345. It takes your iPad to higher places with a level of precision and control you can’t get with a tablet alone. Use it to click, scroll, and control your workflow like never before. It’s small, portable, and comfortable—so you can keep exploring, wherever you go
Logitech i345 mouse does not come with a wireless receiver. It connects via Bluetooth only.
Logitech Pebble i345 tracks fast and accurately whether you use it on a table at your favorite coffee shop or directly on your bed covers.
Just like an iPad, Logitech Pebble i345 is sleek and streamlined. With round corners, clean lines, and modern colors, it is the perfect match to iPad and looks great in any setup.
Logitech Pebble i345 is extra slim and fits naturally in the palm of your hand. Soft, rounded sides are so smooth and comfortable, you’ll never want to let it go.
description: Browse through your iPad with this Logitech Pebble wireless mouse. The fast-tracking feature offers flexible use on multiple surfaces, while the soft, rounded sides comfortably fit into the palm of your hand. This portable Logitech Pebble wireless mouse boasts high precision and control features that permit easy scrolling and clicking. Logitech i345 mouse does not come with a wireless receiver. It connects via Bluetooth.
